episode_summary: In this episode, Carrie McCormick shares her insights on the importance of hospitality in client management and how AI tools can enhance real estate operations. She discusses the challenges faced in the 2024 market and offers practical advice on using social media effectively. Carrie's approach to maintaining a high level of client service and leveraging technology provides valuable lessons for real estate professionals aiming to scale their business.
